snippet: The new finance minister, Gikas Hardouvelis, a professor and former government adviser, will try to enact a tough economic reform program imposed by Greece’s international creditors.
lead_paragraph: The new finance minister, Gikas Hardouvelis, a professor and former government adviser, will try to enact a tough economic reform program imposed by Greece’s international creditors.

headline.main: Greece Replaces Finance Minister in Cabinet Shuffle
